entry.title: $2700 // ***_____!!_BRIGHT_!!____LARGE__Two__Bedroom__Apartment___PARK_SLOPE_**
entry.content:
BRIGHT & MODERN Two Bedroom Apartment!!!

Utilities Included :
* Heat Included
* Hot Water Included

Pets Policy :
Upon Approval

- Tree-lined block
- Shopping & Restaurants nearby
- Quiet neighborhood
- Park & Playground nearby
- Lots of counter tops
- Dishwasher
- Close to bars/nightlife
- Recently renovated
- Hardwood floors
- Large bathroom & kitchen
- Large Closets
- Bright rooms
- Laundry in the corner

Nearby R, F & G express train Stations (Quick Commute to the City!!!)




I have Hundreds of apartment all over Brooklyn, so if this apartment doesn't fit your criteria, let me know I specialize around Park slope, Greenwood heights, Bay Ridge, Sunset Park, Prospect Heights, Windsor TerraceI have Hundreds of apartment all over Brooklyn, so if this apartment doesn't fit your criteria, let me know I specialize around Park slope, Greenwood heights, Bay Ridge, Sunset Park, Prospect Heights, Windsor Terrace.Boerum Hill | South Brooklyn | NYC | Downtown | Williamsburg | Greenwood Heights | Greenpoint | Sunset Park | Bushwick | Kensington | Gowanus | Prospect Park | Bed Stuy | Carroll Gardens | Cobble Hill | Brooklyn Heights | Prospect Heights | Lefferts Garden | Bed stuy | Crown Heights | 1 bedroom apartment 2 bedroom apartment for rent 3 bedroom apartment for rent studio apartment 1br 2 br 3br nakedapartments naked apartment street easy streeteasy zillow apartment for rent in brooklyn no fee Windsor Terrace | Kensington |Ditmas South North | Boerum Hill | Crown Heights | Midwood | Ocean Avenue | Dumbo | Red hook Columbia Waterfront District | Bay Ridge Parkway Sterling St John Lincoln Berkeley Union President Carroll Garfield Warren Butler Baltic Degraw Sackett Degraw Street Place pl | Astoria | Harlem | Windsor Terrace | Prospect park | Park Slope ("park slope") ="park slope"= methodist hospital maimonides lutheran nyu sunset park sunset park park_slope_park_slope_PARK_SLOPE_PARK_SLOPE_Park_Slope Park Slope*Park Slope*Park Slope*Park Slope Park Slope ("park slope") ="park slope"= methodist hospital maimonides lutheran nyu sunset park sunset park
